query.name: category_list
query.description: Category_id list for this brand, please input category in L1 or L2. Max input num of category_id is 50.

query.name: image_id_list
query.description: Image Id of product image for this brand, max input num of file = 10 ,each file's length<=498. ID market is optional.

query.name: app_logo_image_id
query.description: Image_id of logo for app client,please input hashcode of this picture.

query.name: brand_description
query.description: The description of this brand, can input the information, length<=254.
query.sample: Our mission is what drives us to do everything possible to expand human potential. We do that by creating groundbreaking sport innovations, by making our products more sustainably, by building a creative and diverse global team and by making a positive impact in communities where we live and work

query.name: additional_information
query.description: Additional notes or comment can seller can add, length<=254.
query.sample: additional notes or comment can seller can add

query.name: pc_logo_image_id
query.description: Image_id of logo for pc client,please input hashcode of this picture.

query.name: file_name
query.description: Brand registration certificate image name, len < 254

query.name: file_hash
query.description: Image id of brand registration certificate image , max input num of file = 1 , each file's length<=498

query.name: brand_registration_website
query.description: The link to brand registration website, It is mandatory when brand name hit blacklist.len<254

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/register_brand?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "additional_information": "additional notes or comment can seller can add",
    "app_logo_image_id": "6373157f9408b42c8aacda1d63d3a209",
    "brand_country": "US",
    "brand_description": "Our mission is what drives us to do everything possible to expand human potential. We do that by creating groundbreaking sport innovations, by making our products more sustainably, by building a creative and diverse global team and by making a positive impact in communities where we live and work",
    "brand_website": "www.nike.com",
    "category_list": [
        16521,
        16522
    ],
    "original_brand_name": "Nike",
    "pc_logo_image_id": "6373157f9408b42c8aacda1d63d3a209",
    "product_image": {
        "image_id_list": [
            "-"
        ]
    }
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.sample: You has replied this comment already.
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
The market this shop belongs to do not support brand registration.
Brand already exists. If you want to add available category for this brand, you can change the category.
The brand you registered is in the inspection process. Please contact Shopee Customer Service for more information.
This brand name can't be used in several selected categories. You can contact Shopee CS for brand appeal offline if need.
Risky brand name, please provide related license and brand registration website to register this specific brand.
